Export.zv: Cache for UNIX (Red Hat Enterprise Linux for x86-64) 2014.1.3 (Build 775)

Parameter.name: NAMESPACE
Parameter.Description: This is the XML namespace for this component.

Method.name: %OnPreHTTP

XData.name: Style
XData.Description: This Style block contains component-specific CSS style definitions.
XData.Data:
<style type="text/css">
/*Styles for components in this composite component*/
  .title {
          background: #C5D6D6;
          color: black;
          font-size: 1.5em;
          font-weight: bold;
          padding: 5px;
          border-bottom: 1px solid black;
          text-align: center;
    }
/* Default style overrides*/
/* Override default menu item style */
  a.menuItem {
         font-size: 0.9em;
         color: black;
   }
  a.menuItemDisabled {
        font-size: 0.9em;
        color: black;
  }

</style>

XData.name: Contents
XData.Data:
<page> <composite>
<hmenu width="100%"> <!--BEDD*2.0*2;Switched links to onclick --> <menuItem id="m1" caption="Reports" link="BEDDRPTMNU.csp" help="To Be Added" /> <!-- <menuItem id="m2" caption="Rooms" link="BEDDAPPL.EDRoom.cls" help="Go to Application Home Page" /> --> <menuItem id="m2" caption="Rooms" onclick="javascript:zenPage.pRoom()" help="Go to Application Home Page" /> <!-- <menuItem id="m3" caption="Warnings" link="BEDDAPPL.EDWarning.cls" help="View the warnings" /> --> <menuItem id="m3" caption="Warnings" onclick="javascript:zenPage.pWarn()" help="View the warnings" /> <menuItem id="m4" caption="" help="" /> <menuItem id="m5" caption="DashBoard" link="BEDD.csp" help="return to dashboard" /> <menuItem id="m6" caption="" help="" /> <menuItem id="m7" caption="Record Lock" link="BEDDLCKREL.csp" help="return to dashboard" /> <menuItem id="m8" caption="" help="" /> <!-- <menuItem id="m9" caption="Setup" link="BEDDAPPL.EDSystem.cls" help="To Be Added" />--> <menuItem id="m9" caption="Setup" onclick="javascript:zenPage.pSetup()" help="To Be Added" />
<menuItem id="m10" caption="" help="" /> <!-- <menuItem id="m11" caption="Data Fix" link="BEDDFIXA.csp" help="To Be Added" />--> </hmenu>
</composite> </page>
